page.title: 08Community Work
page.content: People in Elford work very hard to keep the village tidy.We hold a poster competition every year where we all draw posters to put on the village hall which tells you to keep Elford tidy.We take part in the Best Kept Village Competition and we have won it in the past.Every Tuesday night Mr.Reynolds with a group of children and parents work in the village doing different jobs.We collect money for Action Aid, Save The Children and other causes.We have knitted squares for blankets to send to Etheopia.We try to be friendly with everyone and "DO AS WE WOULD BE DONE BY".We have a Garden Fete every year to raise money for the church.
